summary:
Adds a NEW, craftable sword based on Quel'Delar from World of Warcraft.

Available as a Dagger, 1H & 2H and is unenchanted. Also comes in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] [/center][center][b][color=#00ffff][url=http://www.techtimes.com/articles/76693/20150814/skyrim-mod-world-of-warcraft-quel-delar-might-of-the-faithful.htm]Featured on Tech Times[/url] & [url=http://kotaku.com/johnskyrim-is-a-modder-who-likes-to-bring-over-stuff-fr-1724073156]Kotaku[/url][/color][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cfcEwtN.png[/img]
[youtube]Vti6cSxOA3Q[/youtube] [youtube]4NAkqeJ6s2M[/youtube][/center]
[b]About:
[/b]
This had been requested quite a few times and whilst working on another mod, I wanted to try out a different technique to improve the quality of my mods. As always, I have taken heavy inspiration from the original weapon "Quel'Delar, Might of the Faithful" from the Wrath of the Lich King expansion of World of Warcraft. I have decided to make this a quicker mod in order to carry on with my other projects. It's unenchanted because I wanted the player to give it whichever effect they choose, instead of forcing them to use an effect I had made myself. Anyways, I hope you enjoy it!

Appearance varies based on ENB Preset & Game Settings. You don't have to like World of Warcraft to use them! 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Quel'Delar Dagger[/b]
[color=#999999]8 Base Damage - Craftable & Unenchanted[/color]

[b]Quel'Delar (One-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]15 Base Damage - Craftable & Unenchanted[/color]

[b]Quel'Delar (Two-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]20 Base Damage - Craftable & Unenchanted[/color]

[color=#ff0000][b][center]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/center]
[/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

Each sword is craftable at the forge under "Steel" and refined using the Grindstone.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Quel'Delar - Johnskyrim.esp
Quel'Delar - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Where is the glowing light?
A. I purposely left it out due to time restraints.

Q. Can you make this this this and this?
A. I might, but unlikely. Modding takes a long time.

Q. Can you make this do this?
A. No!

Q. What ENB are you using?
A. A modified Aeon ENB

Q. What mods are you working on/got planned?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Claws don't claw. I realized this after I made it.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim]
[/url][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
[/url]Please check out my other mods!
